alert.note: Alert for Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 29 at 2:36AM CDT until May 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas... Canadian River at Amarillo 19N affecting Potter County. .Heavy rainfall from thunderstorms is causing the potential for significant rise at the Canadian River north of Amarillo. For the Canadian River...including Amarillo 19N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Canadian River at Amarillo 19N. * WHEN...From early this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Dirt road that runs east alongside the river channel becomes flooded. This road leads to Rosita Creek Flats Recreation Area, where primitive camping occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 6.9 feet early this morning. It will drop to 5.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Action stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.this afternoon at 245 PM CDT.
